DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether N-acetylcysteine effective treatment prevention foot ulcer diabetic patient .
DOC.criteria: Age 45 70 year . Type 1 2 diabetes mellitus foot ulcer ( grade 0 stage C accord Texas University Classification ) . Written informed consent . Nacetylcysteine assumption 6 month previous study . Hypersensibility acetylcysteine . Neoplasms , severe systemic , hepatic , pulmonary , cardiovascular renal disease . Psychiatric disease drug abuse problem .
